(I had Bucky O'Hare, that dumb kid in the monkey suit, Deadeye, Toad Borg, 
the dog dude that Bucky worked for, the Toad General dude, and the Toad 
Fighter, but my dad made me give away the Toad Fighter for a school 
fundraiser because I "never" played with it)

Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot:




Shockwave, despite his best efforts, was struck in his frame by five shots, 
almost unnoticably decreasing his speed.  He launched two missiles, each 
splitting apart, one heading for Termitron the other for Windlord.

Unitron wasn't so lucky, although he was going full speed at 54 MPH he was 
only able to dodge a few shots and a missile, the other missile blowing up 
against the armor plating in front of his treads, causing a huge dent and 
slowing him down a few more MPH.  The five shots dug into his armor, causing 
dents but nothing to serious.

"Afts!" he yelled, his cannon swerving quickly on his turret, launching two 
explosive shells (from a tank, so they're not bullets) at Hot Rod.

---

Firestarter saw the battle several cycles after crossing the Pacific Ocean 
and passing across some land, hovering several hundred feet above ground in 
his biped mode.  "Looks like they're holding their own."

"So?  Let's kick tailgate!" Sixshot yelled, divebombing and launching off two 
missiles, both at Aerotaur.

"Good enough for me!" Firestarter called out after, following the space 
fighter, transforming to his own space fighter mode and firing off twenty 
rapid laser blasts from his nosecone, ten at Cledar and ten at Forrior.
